response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly contribute to your success and satisfaction. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 12000}
